model_description: A high-performance object detection model from Ultralytics, YOLOv11l offers improved speed and accuracy compared to previous versions. Suitable for tasks like image analysis, video surveillance, and autonomous driving.

This model estimates age from facial images using the GoogleNet architecture. It can be used for applications like targeted advertising and access control.  Achieves an accuracy of 85% on the Adience dataset. May exhibit bias in age prediction across different ethnicities.

This model predicts gender from facial images using the GoogleNet architecture.  It can be applied to tasks such as customer segmentation and personalized recommendations. Achieves an accuracy of 92% on the LFW dataset.
This lightweight model is designed for face detection on mobile devices, ideal for real-time applications that require fast and efficient performance.
Accurately detects 33 pose landmarks across the entire body, enabling applications in fitness tracking, motion analysis, and augmented reality experiences.
Provides high-fidelity tracking of 21 hand landmarks per hand, facilitating gesture recognition, sign language interpretation, and the development of interactive controls.
